title: Opportunities for improved consideration of cultural benefits in environmental decision-Making
content:
Publication date: February 2024

Source: Ecosystem Services, Volume 65

Author(s): Kristin R. Hoelting, Joshua W. Morse, Rachelle K. Gould, Doreen E. Martinez, Rina S. Hauptfeld, Amanda E. Cravens, Sara J. Breslow, Lucas S. Bair, Rudy M. Schuster, Michael C. Gavin
